title: Gregor Mendel
Born: Johann Mendel , (1822-07-20)20 July 1822 , Heinzendorf bei Odrau, Silesia, Austrian Empire (now Hynčice, Czech Republic)
Died: 6 January 1884(1884-01-06) (aged 61) , Brünn, Austria-Hungary (now Brno, Czech Republic)
Alma mater: University of Olomouc , University of Vienna
